item.title: Custom Submission Forms
item.description: Custom Submission Forms are used when you want to present a custom look and feel to the user when they submit an entry. You can add a form with many required or optional fields depending on the Entry Type of the submission. 1. Create a Custom Form to be used 1.1 Create Needed Attributes Before a form can be designed, any needed required or custom attributes should be added. To do this: a.
